title: Yoga in the Park at Nature Discovery Center
address: 7112 Newcastle St Houston, TX 77401 United States
body: Enjoy a weekly power yoga class in the park of the Nature Discovery Center. Free Admission

title: Houston Anarchist Bookfair 2017 at MECA Houston
address: 1900 Kane Street Houston, TX 77007 United States
body: The Houston Anarchist Black Cross hosts a one-day convergence to network, grow and celebrate anarchist and anti-authoritarian projects in Texas and the surrounding region. Head to MECA Houston in the Heights for books, workshops, and a discussion. Free Admission

title: Meeting of Styles Houston at the Harrisburg Arts Museum
address: 4200 Harrisburg Houston , TX 77011 United States
body: Head to the East End for this 3-day event that showcases graffiti and mural art with live paintings from Houston-based and international artists. Free Admission

title: The Moonlight Dolls: Bitches Who Brunch at Prohibition Supperclub & Bar
address: 1008 Prairie Houston, TX 77002 United States
body: Grab your girlfriends and a mimosa for Bitches Who Brunch, a first-class yet relaxing afternoon of music, comedy and show-stopping striptease featuring the world-famous Moonlight Dolls. While dining on classic brunch fare like French Toast & Fried Chicken in Houston's elegant and sunny Prohibition Supperclub & Bar. $25 Admission

title: Texas Hot Sauce Festival at Bayou City Event Center
address: 9401 Knight Rd Houston, TX 77045 United States
body: This fiery annual event heats up with hot sauces, salsas, dips, spices, marinades, wing sauces, and jams from all over the country. Admission Tickets are $10 and free for kids 12 and under. The festival benefits the Snowdrop Foundation, which raises money for pediatric cancer patients.

title: Market and Dog Adoption Fair at Southern Star Brewing Company
address: 3525 N. Frazier Street Conroe, TX 77303 United States
body: Enjoy your favorite brew while you shop a variety of locally grown, organic and hand crafted items at this market. There will also be a dog adoption fair by Operation Pets Alive. Free Admission

title: Houston Slavic Heritage Festival at KC Hall
address: 607 East Whitney Street Houston, TX 77022 United States
body: Celebrate the Slavic heritage of Houston’s Czech, Croatian, Polish and Ukranian communities at the annual Houston Slavic Heritage Festival at the Knights of Columbus Hall and Grounds. This event will be filled with the traditional foods, music, and dances of Europe’s Slavic countries. There will be live dance and music performances, kids activities and more. $5 Admission

title: Houston BBQ Throwdown at Saint Arnold Brewing Co.
address: 2000 Lyons Ave Houston, TX 77020 United States
body: Join Saint Arnold at their brewery for the 3rd Annual Houston BBQ Throwdown, which will feature some of the best-smoked meats the city has to offer. Along with a panel of judges, you will sample all of the dishes and decide on your favorite. $65 Admission

title: Last Sundays at RockStar Gallery
address: 5700 NW Central Drive, #160 Houston, TX 77092 United States
body: RockStar Gallery hosts an indoor art market and celebration, with snacks and drinks provided. Participating Gallery Artists The gallery artists are Angela M. Smith, Dee Franklin, Janice Jackson, Dow Money Trees, Koerie, Lisa Hilton, Lorena Fernandez, Masoh Michelli Cockburn, P.A. Mueller, Panisch Sacha, Lazarre Sayra Vallejo, Teresa L. Staley, and Vena Ashley. Free Admission

title: Houston Astros vs. Los Angeles Angels at Minute Maid Park
address: 501 Crawford St Houston, TX 77002 United States
body: Get loud for the 'Stros as they battle it out against the Los Angeles Angels at Minute Maid Park. Admission Tickets start at $10

title: Harvey at A.D. Players Theater
address: 2710 W. Alabama Houston, TX 77098 United States
body: Playwright Mary Chase won a Pulitzer Prize for Harvey, her classic comedy about a mild-mannered middle-aged man named Elwood, his domineering, social-climber sister Veta, and Elwood's best friend (a giant invisible rabbit named Harvey). 20$ Admission

title: Chris Lake at Clé Houston
address: 2301 Main St Houston, TX 77002 United States
body: House DJ and producer Chris Lake spins music to dance to at the trendy Clé Houston lounge. Fashionable poolside attire is required. Admission Tickets are $10.

title: Super Smash Bros Tournament at Eureka Heights Brew Co
address: 941 W 18th St Houston , TX 77008 United States
body: Eureka Heights Brew Co hosts an OG Super Smash Bros (on Nintendo 64) tournament on their 20-feet jumbo screen. Admission No cover charge.

title: Beethoven for All: Harlem Quartet at The Menil Collection
address: 1533 Sul Ross St Houston, TX 77006 United States
body: Harlem Quartet advances diversity in classical music while engaging new audiences with a varied repertoire that includes works by minority composers. Watch them play Beethoven: String Quartet in C Major, Op. 59, No. 3, “Hero” at The Menil Collection. Admission This event is free to attend.

title: Houston Ballet presents Mayerling at The Hobby Center
address: 800 Bagby St Houston, TX 77002 United States
body: The Houston Ballet starts its 48th season with this story, based on the 1889 murder-suicide of the sole heir to the Austo-Hungarian Empire, Crown Price Rudolf and his 17-year-old mistress. The performance schedule hinges on repairs to the Wortham Theater Center, needed due to Hurricane Harvey, being completed on time. Admission $25

title: 4th Wall Theatre Co. presents Disgraced at Studio 101
address: 1824 Spring Street Houston, TX 77007 United States
body: In Disgraced, idle dinner party chit-chat explodes into the kind of rollicking, no-holds-barred argument that makes for truly delicious theater. Winner of a Pulitzer Prize, and also a Tony nominee for Best Play. Admission $32

title: Enemies at Main Street Theater
address: 540 Times Boulevard Houston, TX 7005 United States
body: Main Street Theater stages an original production of Gorky's extraordinary play, which was written in exile and banned in his home country. The play presents a panoramic view of a restless society. It’s 1905, and Russia is at a critical moment in its history. Admission $42

title: Miami Vice Sunday Funday at Henke & Pillot Houston
address: 809 Congress Avenue Houston, TX 77002 United States
body: Spend your Sunday Funday having drinks and brunch as DJ Johnny Mac spins Miami style beats at Henke & Pillot Houston. Admission No cover.

title: The Ultimate Willy Wonka Party at Alamo Drafthouse Mason Park
address: 531 South Mason Road Katy, TX 77450 United States
body: Enter into a world of pure imagination at this Willy Wonka & The Chocolate Factory-themed party and screening that will feature candy, bubbles and even a Q&A with Mike TeeVee (Paris Themmen) and Veruca Salt (Julie Dawn Cole). There will be a showing at 3:15pm, 5:30pm and 6:45pm. Admission Tickets are $28.07.

title: Prelude Music at Levy Park
address: 3801 Eastside Houston , TX 77098 United States
body: Bring the whole family for some fun outdoor music making with a live band at Levy Park. Admission This event is free to attend.

title: Fried Chicken Dinners at Holley’s Seafood Restaurant & Oyster Bar
address: 3201 Louisiana Street Houston, TX 77006 United States
body: On the final Sunday of each month, Holley’s serves up their legendary, award-winning fried chicken, via a special dinner that runs $50 per person with a minimum of six people per party.

title: Depeche Mode in Concert at Cynthia Woods Mitchell Pavilion
address: 2005 Lake Robbins Dr The Woodlands, TX 77380 United States
body: "Enjoy the Silence" when the legendary '80s synth band, Depeche Mode, hits the stage at Cynthia Woods Mitchell Pavilion in The Woodlands. Admission Tickets start at $50.

title: The Dope Art Show: Harvey Relief Benefit Show at Mercy Houston
address: 1505 St Emanuel Houston , TX 77003 United States
body: See a variety of local singers, poets, dancers and painters at The Dope Art Show at Mercy Houston. They have switched up their farewell summer-themed show to farewell Harvey, a Relief Benefit Show to support relief efforts. Admission Early bird tickets are $15 and $25 to $40 for VIP.

title: Lee Fields & The Expressions in Concert at The Heights Theater
address: 339 W 19th St Houston, TX 70008 United States
body: Experience the high James Brown-like energy of the soul singer Lee Fields with his band The Expressions at The Heights Theater. Mia Borders opens the show. Admission Tickets start at $20.

title: Against Me! in Concert at White Oak Music Hall
address: 2915 N Main Street Houston, TX 77009 United States
body: The punk band and political activists Against Me! performs at White Oak Music Hall with openers Bleached and Dirty Nil. Admission Tickets range from $20 to $24.

title: Daryl Hall & John Oates in Concert at Smart Financial Centre
address: 18111 Lexington Boulevard Sugar Land, TX 77479 United States
body: umber-one selling duo in music history and Rock and Roll Hall of Fame inductees, Daryl Hall & John Oates' 39-show tour stops at Smart Financial Centre at Sugar Land. Admission Tickets range from $59.75 to $199.75.

title: ’70s Night at Fox & Hound
address: 11470 Westheimer Road Houston , TX 77077 United States
body: Be ready to boogie in your bell bottoms at this '70s-themed party featuring music, drinks, and food at Fox & Hound. Admission No cover.

title: Songwriter Sundays at Dean’s Downtown
address: 316 Main St Houston, TX United States
body: Spend your Sunday relaxing and listening to music by local singer songwriters at Dean's Downtown. Admission Free

title: The Last Foam Party at Metropolis y Extravaganza
address: 8925 Richmond Ave Houston , TX 77063 United States
body: Put on your beach wear for The Last Foam Party of the year at the Latin night club, Metropolis y Extravaganza. Take advantage of drink specials on well drinks and special shots while dancing to top 40 hits on a floor filled with foam. Admission Cover charge at the door.

title: Industrafest 2017 at Numbers Nightclub
address: 300 Westheimer Houston, TX 77006 United States
body: Celebrate industrial music when the British '70s band Front 242 performs along with special guests Severed Heads, Leæther Strip, and Underground Network Intelligence at Numbers Nightclub in Montrose. Admission Tickets are $40 and $50 at the door.
